RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Sir Dancealot
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Tell me, sir Lancelot, do you... dance a lot? This tool is very good at quick insertion of FX in the chain of the currently selected track. Forget the mouse, use the keyboard.
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Cas | Cas Marrav | casmarrav@gmail.com
